page.title: 08The village policeman.
page.content: P.C.Lomax has been Brinsleys' local policeman for ten years.His jobs involve first aider,social worker, local policeman,child minder and thief catcher.The main police station is in Eastwood.There are three areas which operate from this station :they are Brinsley, Eastwood and Newthorpe and the contact point is at Kimberley. The beat P.C.Lomax patrols starts at the bridge on Mansfield Road and continues to Moorgreen Colliery.From there it goes down a narrow lane near to the Ashfield boundary into Underwood and then to the Brinsley Gin and then back to Mansfield Road.He prefers his beat more than the ones in the big city because of the rural aspects. Brinsley is full of good people who respect the law.The crime rate is comparatively low.
